ground_truth.thought: 创建一个带有专业主题的PowerPoint演示文稿并保存它
ground_truth.name: PPT.create_file

origin_prompt.content: 作为一名银行风险管理分析师，我需要评估银行内部控制的有效性。请从文件 'data_v2/bank_data/credit_risk_report.txt' 中读取最近一年的信用风险报告，并将其加入到一个新的PowerPoint演示文稿中。演示文稿应使用专业主题，并保存在 'outputs/credit_risk_report.pptx'。此外，我希望在演示文稿中添加一个标题为 '信用风险概览' 的文本页，其中包括从文件中提取的前三个关键点。当前这一步的目标是什么?
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'file_path'的值是什么?

{'text': 'The bank has experienced a significant increase in non-performing loans over the past year.
Notable changes include a rise in default rates and a decrease in loan approval rates.
The bank has implemented new risk management policies to address these issues.
...'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'text': 'The bank has experienced a significant increase in non-performing loans over the past year.
Notable changes include a rise in default rates and a decrease in loan approval rates.
The bank has implemented new risk management policies to address these issues.
...'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
创建一个带有专业主题的PowerPoint演示文稿并保存它
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
